description: Schools will be allowed to reopen from 11 May, but with no more than 10 pupils per class.
title: Coronavirus: Belgium unveils plans to lift lockdown
title_page: Coronavirus: Belgium unveils plans to lift lockdown - BBC News
maintext: Meanwhile, Poland's Health Minister Lukasz Szumowski has called for a two-year delay to the presidential election - due to take place in two weeks' time - saying it was the safest situation given the pandemic. So far, the governing Law and Justice party has resisted public and opposition pressure to postpone the vote.
